Texts.Eng: Only skip repairs if the ship isn't currently damaged.

Ship has sustained major damage when escaping earth. Please select which ship type you want:

Frackin Ship:
Build your ship, choosing from a variety of presets. Requires installation of a new FTL Drive. See your tricorder quests for guidance.

Vanilla Ship:
The default starbound ship for your race. Does not have access to some FU ship features.

Texts.Chs:
frackin飞船。 升级方式有所不同。 此种飞船可以使用普通飞船无法使用的功能

当前选择的飞船: <shipName>
当前选择的飞船模式: <shipMode>
Texts.Eng:
The frackin ship. Upgraded differently. This ship type has access to features that the vanilla ship does not have access to.

Currently Selected Ship: <shipName>
Currently Selected Ship Mode: <shipMode>

Texts.Chs: 普通的常规飞船。正常升级。此船类型无法使用frackin飞船使用的某些功能。
Texts.Eng: The normal vanilla ship. Upgraded normally. This ship type won't have access to some of the features the frackin ship will have access to.
